Welcome to SS DevOps And Automation Labs

DevOps is a term for a group of concepts that, while not all new, have catalyzed into a movement and are rapidly spreading throughout the technical community.

Learn About Me

It's me Srini, having 6+ years of experience of IT industry with with multi Clouds and DevOps automation tools. I am also having around 3 years of experience on teaching, I teach technologies like DevOps And Cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, GCP.

TECHNOLOGIES OF WHAT I COVER

DevOps has evolved big time since many of us thought it was just a buzzword. Now we know that is a myth. DevOps has become a main focus and has been shaping the world of software for the last few years. Experts say that DevOps is going to be the mainstream and its popularity is going to reach its peak in 2019. The Following tools which we are going to cover. 1. Linux For DevOps Level 2. Amazon Web Services(AWS) 3. Docker & Docker Swarm 4. Kubernetes 5. Ansible 6. Git & Github 7. Jenkins 8. Real time based project with CICD Pipeline 9. Terraform 10. Grafana & Promotheus.
